title: BRIEF-Argonaut Gold Reports Incident At The La Colorada Mine In Sonora, Mexico
text:
BRIEF-Argonaut Gold Reports Incident At The La Colorada Mine In Sonora, Mexico

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 12, 2019 12:00)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Argonaut Gold Reports Incident At The La Colorada Mine In Sonora, Mexico Oct 12 (Reuters) - Argonaut Gold Inc : * ARGONAUT GOLD REPORTS INCIDENT AT THE LA COLORADA MINE IN SONORA, MEXICO * ARGONAUT GOLD- 2 INDIVIDUALS WHO WORK FOR CO'S MINING CONTRACTOR AT ITS LA COLORADA MINE WERE FATALITY INJURED AS A RESULT OF A HIGH VOLTAGE ACCIDENT * ARGONAUT GOLD- 2 INDIVIDUALS FATALITY INJURED AS A RESULT OF HIGH VOLTAGE ACCIDENT WHILE PERFORMING MAINTENANCE ON HAUL TRUCK ON FRIDAY, OCT 11, 2019 * COMPANY TEMPORARILY SUSPENDED OPERATIONS FOLLOWING INCIDENT ON OCTOBER 11, 2019 AND HAS NOW RESUMED NORMAL OPERATIONS

BRIEF-Argonaut Gold Reports Incident At The La Colorada Mine In Sonora, Mexico
description: BRIEF-Argonaut Gold Reports Incident At The La Colorada Mine In Sonora, Mexico
